entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
